categories: Category:Battles in the freestanding subsectors of the Mid Rim
Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: The Cleansing of Nopsin was a military operation carried out by the Imperial Military commanded by the General Greist and Lieutenants Pierce and Phenter on the planet Nopsin sometime during the Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.
